title: s0lidus
author: s0lidus
content: Dice Giveaway - Prize of $50 in BTC to the player who hits 8,100,000,000th bet.Rules- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- Minimum bet: 1000 satoshi or altcoin equivalent.- Payout must be 2x or more.- To claim reward, player must report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required BetID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: I don't think it should be called a Giveaway while players need to play with their deposited money and there are other restrictions as well which should be maintained by a player to participate. The minimum bet is 1000 Satoshi which is around $0.29 at this moment and players have to play over 2x multiplier. So, you should name it as contest instead of giveaway.
